content:
FWIW, I just reviewed the first three quarters of #12422: easy adaptions for the multi-goal linter; removing superfluous focusing dots. As this presumably bit-rots quickly, more eyes are certainly helpful. :-)

(My review comments are also for future reviewers; mostly, they are saying "this is fine".)

@Michael Rothgang thank you very much for your review!

In an effort to simplify reviewing, I created #12521 that contains all the changes of #12422 up to and including CategoryTheory.

(When I was preparing these PRs, I wanted to be done quickly and what I produced was massive. I will try to keep ahead of the reviews, but I am a bit hesitant to split all the PRs right away, since it is easier to have to fix the merge conflicts in a smaller number of PRs.)
I just reviewed the remainder of the PR: it's massive, but there's nothing to see. I think this is ready to go!
Thanks Michael! I agree that those PRs are boring, and I think that this is the only way to make them mergeable: anything that could be interesting would catch all the attention! :smile:
